Module jBomberman
Package view

Interface MyJBombermanFormat

All Known Implementing Classes:
Arches, ArchesCity, ArchesClassical, ArchesJungle, DecoratedEnemyBoss, DecoratedGravediggerByNpc, DynaFrame, DynaManager, DynaMasterCard, DynaSlaveGame, DynaSlaveStart, EnjoyNpcMediator, EnjoyPowerUpMediator, FactoryDecoratedLevel, FactoryDecoratedNPC, FactoryDecoratedPlayerCharacter, StatePlaying, ThreadDelta, ThreadGame, ThreadMenu
public interface MyJBombermanFormat
Interface with public static field for these parameters: Game fluidity, Sprite standard dimensions, Game grid dimensions and derived values, PC's spawn coordinates.
